title: Warriors and Minstrels
longDescription:
Warriors and Minstrels

RPG Music Loops


Do you like it? Please leave a review.

Warriors and Minstrels is a pack of 13 high quality medieval fantasy music loops. Here you can find calm atmospheric music depicting all kind of a mysterious magic world landscapes as well as epic battle themes, trailer and credits music. In these loops you will hear celtic harp, battle drums, world percussion, epic orchestral brass and strings. And only in this pack live cello performs most of the solo parts making this music differ from others. Tempo of each file is written in a track name so you will not have problems with Interactive Music implementation systems like FMOD and Wwise.

♫ Audio preview - click here ♫
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Eleven Ship (trailer) [1:22]
  • The Eleven Legend fast (loop) [1:53]
  • The Eleven Legent ambient (loop) [1:41]
  • Mountian Call march (loop) [1:27]
  • Mountian Call long (loop) [1:53]
  • Love Anthem epic (loop) [1:09]
  • Love Anthem calm (loop) [2:41]
  • Eternal Cry (loop) [1:49]
  • Rainbow Rise (loop) [3:56]
  • Maiden in the Moor (loop) [3:48]
  • I Shall Be Waiting (loop) [4:40]
  • The Pilgrim (loop) [5:24]
  • Eternal Cry credits (loop) [2:34]


Number of Audio Wavs: 13

Number of Audio Cues: 13

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Size: 346 MB

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 34 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
